##### FILE: capabilities_baseline0923.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule check-for-labels failed at path /metadata/labels/

1 - validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule validate-resources failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/resources/

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

        - NET_RAW

    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline0932.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE

        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline095.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline096.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline097.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline1100.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default

  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:

    name: initcontainer1

        - NET_RAW

    runAsNonRoot: true

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext: {}

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline1144.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline1153.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline1163.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default

  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause

  securityContext: {}

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext: {}

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline1263.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1 failed:
1 - check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule check-for-labels failed at path /metadata/labels/

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline1264.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext: {}

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext: {}

---

1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default

  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause

    name: initcontainer1

        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:

  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause

        - NET_RAW
        drop:
        - ALL

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline1357.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext: {}

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline136.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:

  namespace: default

  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1

      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline1384.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---


Mutation:

  securityContext:

  name: capabilities_baseline1

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline141.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default

  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

        - ALL

        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline145.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default

  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause

  securityContext: {}

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline146.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline147.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline148.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline1485.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline150.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline151.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline152.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline1540.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

        - ALL

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline155.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline1550.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---


Mutation:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

        - ALL

        - NET_RAW
        drop:
        - ALL

    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline1670.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext: {}

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1

policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1 failed:
1 - validate-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed. rule validate-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1 failed:
1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1 failed:
1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1 failed:
1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1 failed:
1 - check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule check-for-labels failed at path /metadata/labels/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1 failed:
1 - validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule validate-resources failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1 failed:
1 - validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1 failed:
1 - validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/containers/0/securityContext/readOnlyRootFilesystem/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1 failed:
1 - validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule validate-registries failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/image/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default

  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline1744.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext: {}

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule check-for-labels failed at path /metadata/labels/

        - ALL

    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
